channel.title: [PI] when use bones on alter it will continue till all bones are used up? Help

item.title: [PI] when use bones on alter it will continue till all bones are used up? Help
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

while (c.getItems.playerHasItem(id)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(id, c.getItems().getItemSlot(id), 1); }should suffice

item.title: [PI] when use bones on alter it will continue till all bones are used up? Help
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

public void bonesOnAltar(int id) { c.getItems().deleteItem(id, c.getItems().getItemSlot(id), 1); c.sendMessage("The gods are pleased with your offering."); c.getPA().addSkillXP(getExp(id)*2*Config.PRAYER_EXPERIENCE, 5); //handleZombie(); }
thats in my prayer.java what do i have to add to make it use up all bones in invi and not stop? instead of using every bone each time?

Read full topic
